doc:
Peter Armitage (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Armitage_(actor) 0 Peter James Armitage (23 October 1939 – 30 November 2018) was an English television actor who trained at the East 15 Acting School. He was a regular on British screens from the 1970s onwards. Peter_James_Armitage ( 23_October_1939 – 30_November_2018 ) was an_English_television_actor who trained at the_East_15_Acting_School . He was a_regular on British_screens from the_1970s_onwards .
